tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PaperInventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    paper_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    supplier_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE InkInventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ink_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    supplier_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE PrintProductionOrders (
		OrderID UUID PRIMARY KEY,
		PaperID UUID,
		InkID UUID,
		MaterialID UUID,
		Quantity INT,
		OrderDate TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PrintMediaPaperInventory (
    paper_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    paper_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    paper_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PrintMediaInkInventory (
    ink_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ink_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ink_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PrintMediaOtherMaterialsInventory (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    material_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PrintMediaOrders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity_ordered INT NOT NULL,
    order_date DATE NOT NULL,
    delivery_date DATE
);
